评论概述: Pretty warmer-weather sweater that will need a little extra care
评论详情: I have worn this sweater a few times now and have received compliments.  I wear it over a stretchy black lycra tank-style camisole with a long silver pendant and the look is cute and flattering.  I was not looking for the off-shoulder look, so I ordered true to size (I am 5'7" and 152 lbs and bought a medium).  Order up if you want it to hang off-shoulder as shown in the advertising!  As many other people have pointed out it is a loose-weave knit that will be prone to catching on things, so extra care should be taken both in wearing and washing the garment.  I put it in a lingerie bag so it wouldn't catch on anything else in the washer, used a cold water gentle cycle, and line-dried.  It came out as nice as before it was washed.  I'm considering ordering again in other colors but I might wait until I have worn it a few more times to see how the fabric holds up over time.

评论概述: Great weight for Spring or Fall
评论详情: I like the weight and fun aspect of this top but it so does not fit like this pic. In no way would this hang off my shoulder. I think I could try a goofy looking, pull hard to one side and it still would hang straight & boxy. This is a straight, elbow length sleeved, v-necked, holey sweater. Arm length reaches to elbow so upper arms are covered if that’s s concern of yours, although I say, own your body, baby!!! Length hits just below the belly button - no way to tuck it in!! Fun but nothing like the model. Maybe I’m too tall & shoulder width appropriate for this style. Probably looks great on a more petite person than I. Other than my size disillusions, for the right body type, probably very cute. For my body type, this is how it fits me.
